description: Try our easy to follow Honey Chicken Stir-Fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Honey Chicken StirFry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chicken, soy, honey, onion, garlic, ginger and chilli in a snap lock bag. Seal and rub together to combine ingredients and coat chicken. Remove as much air from the bag as possible and reseal. Label and date bag and refrigerate overnight to marinate. Transfer to freezer, lying flat to reduce space. Freeze for up to 3 months.
Place veggies and seeds into second bag. Seal. Freeze for up to 3 months.

Defrost bag with chicken in fridge overnight. Heat a wok over high heat. Add oil. Transfer chicken to wok, reserving marinade. Stirfry in batches, tossing often, for 4-5 minutes or until golden. Add frozen vegetables and cook for 2-3 minutes or until tender. Add reserved marinade to wok. Cook for 2 minutes. Serve with steamed rice.
